comments.body: After the bound on `IArray`, this cast may be avoided.

diffHunk:

  override def toString = elems.asInstanceOf[Array[Object]].mkString("(", ",", ")")

comments.body: Not sure what `getClass.hashCode * 41` gives to the hash.
It's just to distinguish `TupleXXL` hashes from other hashes over `elems`.
